prompt: Je reçois beaucoup de notifications concernant toutes sortes de pages qui ne m'intéressent pas. Il semble qu'elles aient été activées automatiquement. Comment puis-je désactiver ces notifications?
expected_answer: Par défaut, une page où vous avez apporté une modification importante est automatiquement ajoutée à la liste des pages que vous suivez. Cela signifie que vous serez notifié des changements sur votre travail. Vous pouvez modifier le paramètre pour "Suivi automatique des pages" dans les paramètres de notification de votre profil utilisateur. Vous pouvez supprimer les filtres de notification existants qui ont été créés de cette manière dans la liste "Filtres personnalisés" des paramètres de notification de votre profil utilisateur.

 To disable unwanted notifications, you can follow these steps:

1. Go to your **user profile** by clicking on your avatar at the top right corner of the XWiki interface and selecting "Profile" from the dropdown menu.
2. In your user profile, find the "**Notifications settings**" section, which allows you to choose which types of notifications you want to receive.
3. By default, users only get notifications when they are mentioned or when actions are performed on pages they created or updated. For receiving other notifications, you need to select which "types" of notifications you want to receive. If you want to stop receiving certain types of notifications, simply uncheck the corresponding boxes.
4. Note that the options from the "alert" menu represent the pages/spaces/wiki you want to get notifications for. You can adjust these settings as needed.
5. If you find that you are still receiving unwanted notifications, it is possible that they were activated automatically due to certain behaviors, such as modifying a page where Auto Watch is enabled. In this case, you can change the Auto Watch behavior in the settings.
6. If you want to stop following a user, you can go to their profile and click on the "Unfollow" button.

Keep in mind that these instructions are based on the information available from the search results provided, which may or may not be entirely relevant to your specific situation. However, they should give you a general idea of how to manage your notification settings in XWiki.
